## 2) –¢–µ—Ä–º–∏–Ω—ã (—á—Ç–æ–±—ã –º—ã –æ–¥–∏–Ω–∞–∫–æ–≤–æ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–ª–∏)

- **–°—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏–π** ‚Äî —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ —à–∞–≥–æ–≤ (navigate / wait / click / fill / screenshot –∏ —Ç.–¥.).
- **–ü—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω (Run)** ‚Äî –æ–¥–Ω–æ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏—è –æ—Ç –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–∞ –¥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–∞.
- **Worker / Virtual User** ‚Äî –ø–∞—Ä–∞–ª–ª–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –±–µ—Ä—ë—Ç –∑–∞–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω—ã –∏ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ—Ç –∏—Ö.
- **Concurrency** ‚Äî —Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ workers —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ.
- **TotalRuns** ‚Äî —Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ –∑–∞ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫.

## 3) –í–∞–∂–Ω—ã–π –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å: Iterations/TotalRuns ‚Äî –∫–∞–∫ —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—â–µ –∏ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–µ–µ

–ï—Å—Ç—å 3 –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç–∞:

### –í–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç A (—Ä–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥—É—é –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ—Ç—ã): ‚Äú–û–±—â–µ–µ —á–∏—Å–ª–æ –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω–æ–≤‚Äù
**–ü–æ–ª—è –≤ UI:**
- `TotalRuns` (–æ–±—â–µ–µ –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω–æ–≤)
- `Concurrency` (–ø–∞—Ä–∞–ª–ª–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å 1..50)

**–ü—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä:** TotalRuns=200, Concurrency=10 ‚Üí –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∏–¥—ë—Ç 10 –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω–æ–≤, –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç 20 ‚Äú–ø–∞—á–µ–∫‚Äù.  
**–ü–ª—é—Å—ã:** –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è, –ª–µ–≥–∫–æ –æ–±—ä—è—Å–Ω—è—Ç—å –Ω–∞—É—á—Ä—É–∫—É, –Ω–µ—Ç –ø—É—Ç–∞–Ω–∏—Ü—ã ‚Äú—É–º–Ω–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è‚Äù.
**–ú–∏–Ω—É—Å—ã:** –Ω–µ—Ç —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–∞ ‚Äú—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–≥–æ –æ–¥–∏–Ω–∞–∫–æ–≤–æ –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è‚Äù (–æ–±—ã—á–Ω–æ —ç—Ç–æ –Ω–µ –≤–∞–∂–Ω–æ –¥–ª—è –¥–∏–ø–ª–æ–º–∞).

### –í–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç B: ‚Äú–ü—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ –≤–æ—Ä–∫–µ—Ä–∞‚Äù
**–ü–æ–ª—è –≤ UI:**
- `RunsPerWorker`
- `Concurrency`

**–ò—Ç–æ–≥–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω—ã:** Concurrency * RunsPerWorker  
**–ü–ª—é—Å—ã:** –∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∞—è –º–æ–¥–µ–ª—å load testing (VU * iterations).
**–ú–∏–Ω—É—Å—ã:** –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–∏ —á–∞—Å—Ç–æ –ø—É—Ç–∞—é—Ç—Å—è, –ø–æ—á–µ–º—É ‚Äú10 –≤–æ—Ä–∫–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏ 100 –∏—Ç–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–π‚Äù = 1000 –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω–æ–≤.

### –í–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç C (–∫–æ–º–ø—Ä–æ–º–∏—Å—Å): –¥–≤–∞ —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–∞ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å
UI: —Ä–∞–¥–∏–æ–∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ **( ) –í—Å–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω–æ–≤** / **( ) –ù–∞ –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ –≤–æ—Ä–∫–µ—Ä–∞**.  
–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –º—ã –≤—Å—ë —Ä–∞–≤–Ω–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥–∏–º —ç—Ç–æ –≤ **TotalRuns**, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –¥–≤–∏–∂–æ–∫ –±—ã–ª –æ–¥–∏–Ω.

**–ú–æ–π —Å–æ–≤–µ—Ç:** —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –Ω–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—è—Ç—å –¥–∏–ø–ª–æ–º, –±–µ—Ä–∏ **–í–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç A**.  
–ï—Å–ª–∏ –æ—á–µ–Ω—å —Ö–æ—á–µ—Ç—Å—è ‚Äî –í–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç C (–Ω–æ —ç—Ç–æ +1 —ç–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç UI, –Ω–µ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—à–Ω–æ).

–Ø —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞–ª –º–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω–æ, –Ω–æ —É–∂–µ —Å —É—á—ë—Ç–æ–º —Ç–æ–≥–æ, —á—Ç–æ –º—ã –æ–±—Å—É–¥–∏–ª–∏:

<Window xmlns="https://github.com/avaloniaui"

    <!-- Row 1: –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ã –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞ -->

</Window>

using System;
using System.Collections.ObjectModel;
using System.Reactive.Linq;
using System.Reflection;
using System.Threading;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using System.Windows.Input;
using ReactiveUI;

namespace WebLoadTester.ViewModels;

public sealed class MainWindowViewModel : ViewModelBase
{
    // ===== Fields =====
    private string _targetUrl = "https://example.com";
    private string _instanceName = Environment.MachineName;

    private decimal _totalRuns = 50;
    private decimal _concurrency = 10;
    private decimal _timeoutSeconds = 10;

    private bool _headless = true;
    private bool _screenshotAfterRun = true;
    private bool _telegramEnabled;

    private string _status = "Idle";
    private string _progressText = "0/0";
    private bool _isRunning;

    private CancellationTokenSource? _cts;

    // ===== Properties =====
    public string TargetUrl
    {
        get => _targetUrl;
        set => this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(ref _targetUrl, value);
    }

    public string InstanceName
    {
        get => _instanceName;
        set => this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(ref _instanceName, value);
    }

    public string AppVersion { get; } =
        $"v{(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetName().Version?.Major ?? 1)}." +
        $"{(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetName().Version?.Minor ?? 0)}";

    // NumericUpDown –¥—Ä—É–∂–∏—Ç —Å decimal –ª—É—á—à–µ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ
    public decimal TotalRuns
    {
        get => _totalRuns;
        set => this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(ref _totalRuns, value);
    }

    public decimal Concurrency
    {
        get => _concurrency;
        set => this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(ref _concurrency, value);
    }

    public decimal TimeoutSeconds
    {
        get => _timeoutSeconds;
        set => this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(ref _timeoutSeconds, value);
    }

    public bool Headless
    {
        get => _headless;
        set => this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(ref _headless, value);
    }

    public bool ScreenshotAfterRun
    {
        get => _screenshotAfterRun;
        set => this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(ref _screenshotAfterRun, value);
    }

    public bool TelegramEnabled
    {
        get => _telegramEnabled;
        set => this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(ref _telegramEnabled, value);
    }

    public string Status
    {
        get => _status;
        set => this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(ref _status, value);
    }

    public string ProgressText
    {
        get => _progressText;
        set => this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(ref _progressText, value);
    }

    public bool IsRunning
    {
        get => _isRunning;
        private set
        {
            this.RaiseAndSetIfChanged(ref _isRunning, value);
            this.RaisePropertyChanged(nameof(CanStart));
        }
    }

    public bool CanStart => !IsRunning;

    public ObservableCollection<string> Log { get; } = new();

using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;

namespace WebLoadTester.ViewModels;

public abstract class ViewModelBase : INotifyPropertyChanged
{
    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler? PropertyChanged;

    protected bool SetField<T>(ref T field, T value, [CallerMemberName] string? name = null)
    {
        if (EqualityComparer<T>.Default.Equals(field, value))
            return false;

        field = value;
        PropertyChanged?.Invoke(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(name));
        return true;
    }

    protected void Raise([CallerMemberName] string? name = null)
        => PropertyChanged?.Invoke(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(name));
}

using System;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using System.Windows.Input;

namespace WebLoadTester.ViewModels;

public sealed class RelayCommand : ICommand
{
    private readonly Action _execute;
    private readonly Func<bool>? _canExecute;

    public RelayCommand(Action execute, Func<bool>? canExecute = null)
    {
        _execute = execute;
        _canExecute = canExecute;
    }

    public event EventHandler? CanExecuteChanged;

    public bool CanExecute(object? parameter) => _canExecute?.Invoke() ?? true;

    public void Execute(object? parameter) => _execute();

    public void RaiseCanExecuteChanged() => CanExecuteChanged?.Invoke(this, EventArgs.Empty);
}

public sealed class AsyncRelayCommand : ICommand
{
    private readonly Func<Task> _execute;
    private readonly Func<bool>? _canExecute;
    private bool _isExecuting;

    public AsyncRelayCommand(Func<Task> execute, Func<bool>? canExecute = null)
    {
        _execute = execute;
        _canExecute = canExecute;
    }

    public event EventHandler? CanExecuteChanged;

    public bool CanExecute(object? parameter)
        => !_isExecuting && (_canExecute?.Invoke() ?? true);

    public async void Execute(object? parameter)
    {
        if (!CanExecute(parameter)) return;

        try
        {
            _isExecuting = true;
            RaiseCanExecuteChanged();
            await _execute();
        }
        finally
        {
            _isExecuting = false;
            RaiseCanExecuteChanged();
        }
    }

    public void RaiseCanExecuteChanged() => CanExecuteChanged?.Invoke(this, EventArgs.Empty);
}

    public bool TelegramEnabled { get => _telegramEnabled; set => SetField(ref _telegramEnabled, value); }

    public string ProgressText { get => _progressText; set => SetField(ref _progressText, value); }

    public bool IsRunning
    {
        get => _isRunning;
        private set

            if (!SetField(ref _isRunning, value)) return;

    private readonly RelayCommand _stopCmd;

    public MainWindowViewModel()

        _restartCmd = new AsyncRelayCommand(RestartAsync, () => IsRunning);
        _stopCmd = new RelayCommand(Stop, () => IsRunning);

        StartCommand = _startCmd;
        RestartCommand = _restartCmd;

    }

    private void RaiseCommandStates()

        _restartCmd.RaiseCanExecuteChanged();
        _stopCmd.RaiseCanExecuteChanged();
    }

    private Task LoadScenarioAsync()
    {
        Log.Add($"{DateTime.Now:HH:mm:ss} –ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ scenario.json (–ø–æ–∫–∞ –∑–∞–≥–ª—É—à–∫–∞)");
        return Task.CompletedTask;
    }

    private Task SaveScenarioAsync()
    {
        Log.Add($"{DateTime.Now:HH:mm:ss} –°–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ scenario.json (–ø–æ–∫–∞ –∑–∞–≥–ª—É—à–∫–∞)");
        return Task.CompletedTask;
    }

    private async Task StartAsync()
    {
        IsRunning = true;
        Status = "Running";
        _cts = new CancellationTokenSource();

        var total = (int)TotalRuns;
        var conc = (int)Concurrency;

        Log.Add($"{DateTime.Now:HH:mm:ss} –°—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç: url={TargetUrl}, TotalRuns={total}, Concurrency={conc}");

        // TODO: –ø–æ–∑–∂–µ —Ç—É—Ç –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–æ—è—â–∏–π runner Playwright
        for (int i = 1; i <= total; i++)

            ProgressText = $"{i}/{total}";
            await Task.Delay(30, _cts.Token);
        }

        Status = "Done";
        Log.Add($"{DateTime.Now:HH:mm:ss} –ó–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–æ");
        IsRunning = false;
    }

    private async Task RestartAsync()
    {
        Stop();
        await StartAsync();
    }

    private void Stop()
    {
        _cts?.Cancel();
        Status = "Stopped";
        Log.Add($"{DateTime.Now:HH:mm:ss} –û—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–æ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–º");
        IsRunning = false;
    }
}

<Window xmlns="https://github.com/avaloniaui"
        xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
        xmlns:vm="using:WebLoadTester.ViewModels"
        xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008"

        x:Class="WebLoadTester.Views.MainWindow"

        Title="WebLoadTester"
        Background="#E6E6E6"
        ThemeVariant="Light">

  <Design.DataContext>
    <vm:MainWindowViewModel/>
  </Design.DataContext>

  <!-- –ù–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—â–∏—Ö —Å—Ç–∏–ª–µ–π -->
  <Window.Styles>
    <Style Selector="TextBlock.h1">
      <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="16"/>
      <Setter Property="FontWeight" Value="SemiBold"/>
    </Style>

    <Style Selector="TextBlock.label">
      <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="13"/>
      <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="#222"/>
      <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center"/>
    </Style>

    <Style Selector="TextBox, NumericUpDown, ComboBox">
      <Setter Property="MinHeight" Value="30"/>
    </Style>

    <!-- –õ–æ–≥: —á—ë—Ä–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ–Ω –∏ —Å–≤–µ—Ç–ª—ã–π —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç -->
    <Style Selector="ListBox.log">
      <Setter Property="Background" Value="#0B0B0B"/>
      <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0"/>
    </Style>

    <Style Selector="ListBox.log TextBlock">
      <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="#E6E6E6"/>
      <Setter Property="FontFamily" Value="Cascadia Mono,Consolas,Menlo,Monospace"/>
      <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="13"/>
    </Style>
  </Window.Styles>

  <Grid Margin="12"
        ColumnDefinitions="300,*,340"
        RowDefinitions="Auto,*,Auto"
        ColumnSpacing="12"
        RowSpacing="10">

    <!-- ===================== LEFT: CSS selectors ===================== -->
    <Border Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="0" Grid.RowSpan="3"
            Background="#F2F2F2"
            BorderBrush="#C8C8C8" BorderThickness="1"
            Padding="10">

      <Grid RowDefinitions="Auto,*,Auto" RowSpacing="8">
        <TextBlock Text="–ù–∞–∂–∞—Ç–∏—è CSS selector" Classes="h1"/>

        <ListBox Grid.Row="1"
                 ItemsSource="{Binding Selectors}"
                 SelectedItem="{Binding SelectedSelector}"
                 MinHeight="200"/>

        <StackPanel Grid.Row="2" Orientation="Horizontal" Spacing="8">
          <Button Content="+ Add" Command="{Binding AddSelectorCommand}"/>
          <Button Content="Remove" Command="{Binding RemoveSelectorCommand}"
                  IsEnabled="{Binding HasSelectedSelector}"/>
          <Button Content="Up" Command="{Binding MoveSelectorUpCommand}"
                  IsEnabled="{Binding HasSelectedSelector}"/>
          <Button Content="Down" Command="{Binding MoveSelectorDownCommand}"
                  IsEnabled="{Binding HasSelectedSelector}"/>
        </StackPanel>
      </Grid>
    </Border>

    <!-- ===================== CENTER TOP: Parameters ===================== -->
    <Border Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="0"
            Background="#F2F2F2"
            BorderBrush="#C8C8C8" BorderThickness="1"
            Padding="12">

      <Grid ColumnDefinitions="Auto,*,Auto,180,Auto,Auto"
            RowDefinitions="Auto,Auto,Auto,Auto"
            ColumnSpacing="10" RowSpacing="10">

        <!-- Row 0: URL + Name + Version -->
        <TextBlock Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Text="–°—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞:" Classes="label"/>

        <TextBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1"
                 Text="{Binding TargetUrl}"
                 Watermark="https://example.com"/>

        <TextBlock Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="2" Text="Name:" Classes="label"/>

        <TextBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="3"
                 Text="{Binding InstanceName}"
                 Watermark="PC-Name"/>

        <TextBlock Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="4"
                   Text="{Binding AppVersion}"
                   Foreground="#666"
                   VerticalAlignment="Center"/>

        <!-- Row 1: TotalRuns / Concurrency / Timeout -->
        <TextBlock Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Text="–í—Å–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω–æ–≤:" Classes="label"/>

                       Value="{Binding TotalRuns}"
                       Minimum="1" Maximum="1000000"
                       Width="160"/>

        <TextBlock Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="2" Text="–ü–∞—Ä–∞–ª–ª–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ (1‚Äì50):" Classes="label"/>

        <NumericUpDown Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="3"
                       Value="{Binding Concurrency}"
                       Minimum="1" Maximum="50"
                       Width="140"/>

        <TextBlock Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="4" Text="–¢–∞–π–º–∞—É—Ç (—Å–µ–∫):" Classes="label"/>

        <NumericUpDown Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="5"
                       Value="{Binding TimeoutSeconds}"
                       Minimum="1" Maximum="300"
                       Width="110"/>

        <!-- Row 2: Checkboxes -->
        <StackPanel Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="6"
                    Orientation="Horizontal" Spacing="18">
          <CheckBox Content="–ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ –±—Ä–∞—É–∑–µ—Ä–∞ –±–µ–∑ UI"
                    IsChecked="{Binding Headless}"/>

                    IsChecked="{Binding ScreenshotAfterRun}"/>
          <CheckBox Content="Telegram"
                    IsChecked="{Binding TelegramEnabled}"/>
        </StackPanel>

        <!-- Row 3: Buttons -->
        <StackPanel Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="6"
                    Orientation="Horizontal" Spacing="10">

          <Button Content="Load scenario.json"
                  Command="{Binding LoadScenarioCommand}"/>

          <Button Content="Save scenario.json"
                  Command="{Binding SaveScenarioCommand}"/>

          <Separator Width="18" Opacity="0"/>

          <Button Content="–ù–∞—á–∞—Ç—å"
                  Command="{Binding StartCommand}"
                  IsEnabled="{Binding CanStart}"/>

          <Button Content="–ü–µ—Ä–µ–∑–∞–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å"
                  Command="{Binding RestartCommand}"
                  IsEnabled="{Binding IsRunning}"/>

          <Button Content="–°—Ç–æ–ø"
                  Command="{Binding StopCommand}"
                  IsEnabled="{Binding IsRunning}"/>

          <Separator Width="18" Opacity="0"/>

          <Button Content="Telegram Settings"
                  Command="{Binding ToggleTelegramPanelCommand}"/>
        </StackPanel>

      </Grid>
    </Border>

    <!-- ===================== CENTER: LOG ===================== -->
    <Border Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="1"
            Background="#F2F2F2"
            BorderBrush="#C8C8C8" BorderThickness="1"
            Padding="10">

      <Grid RowDefinitions="Auto,*" RowSpacing="8">
        <TextBlock Text="–õ–æ–≥ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è" Classes="h1"/>

        <Border Grid.Row="1"
                Background="#0B0B0B"
                BorderBrush="#3A3A3A" BorderThickness="1"
                Padding="8">

          <ScrollViewer VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Auto">
            <ListBox Classes="log"
                     ItemsSource="{Binding Log}">
              <ListBox.ItemTemplate>
                <DataTemplate>
                  <TextBlock Text="{Binding}"/>
                </DataTemplate>
              </ListBox.ItemTemplate>
            </ListBox>
          </ScrollViewer>

        </Border>
      </Grid>
    </Border>

    <!-- ===================== RIGHT: Telegram panel (toggle) ===================== -->
    <Border Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="0" Grid.RowSpan="2"
            IsVisible="{Binding IsTelegramPanelVisible}"
            Background="#F2F2F2"
            BorderBrush="#C8C8C8" BorderThickness="1"
            Padding="12">

      <Grid RowDefinitions="Auto,Auto,Auto,Auto,Auto,Auto,*"
            ColumnDefinitions="*,*"
            ColumnSpacing="10"
            RowSpacing="10">

        <TextBlock Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"
                   Text="Telegram Settings" Classes="h1"/>

        <CheckBox Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"
                  Content="–û—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –≤ Telegram"
                  IsChecked="{Binding TelegramSendEnabled}"
                  IsEnabled="{Binding TelegramEnabled}"/>

        <CheckBox Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"
                  Content="–û—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –°–∫—Ä–∏–Ω—à–æ—Ç"
                  IsChecked="{Binding TelegramSendScreenshot}"
                  IsEnabled="{Binding TelegramEnabled}"/>

        <TextBlock Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="0"
                   Text="–†–µ–∂–∏–º –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∏:" Classes="label"/>

        <ComboBox Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="1"
                  ItemsSource="{Binding TelegramModes}"
                  SelectedItem="{Binding SelectedTelegramMode}"
                  IsEnabled="{Binding TelegramEnabled}"/>

        <TextBlock Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="0"
                   Text="Bot Token:" Classes="label"/>

        <TextBox Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="1"
                 Text="{Binding TelegramBotToken}"
                 IsEnabled="{Binding TelegramEnabled}"
                 Watermark="123456:ABC-DEF..."/>

        <TextBlock Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="0"
                   Text="Chat ID:" Classes="label"/>

        <TextBox Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="1"
                 Text="{Binding TelegramChatId}"
                 IsEnabled="{Binding TelegramEnabled}"
                 Watermark="-1001234567890"/>

        <StackPanel Grid.Row="6" Grid.Column="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"
                    Orientation="Horizontal" Spacing="10">
          <Button Content="Test"
                  Command="{Binding TestTelegramCommand}"
                  IsEnabled="{Binding TelegramEnabled}"/>
          <Button Content="Close"
                  Command="{Binding ToggleTelegramPanelCommand}"/>
        </StackPanel>

      </Grid>
    </Border>

    <!-- ===================== STATUS BAR ===================== -->
    <Border Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="2" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"
            Background="#F2F2F2"
            BorderBrush="#C8C8C8" BorderThickness="1"
            Padding="8">

      <DockPanel>
        <TextBlock Text="{Binding Status}" Foreground="#333"/>
        <TextBlock DockPanel.Dock="Right"
                   Text="{Binding ProgressText}"
                   Foreground="#333"/>
      </DockPanel>
    </Border>

  </Grid>
</Window>

–° —É—á—ë—Ç–æ–º —Ç–æ–≥–æ, —á—Ç–æ —É —Ç–µ–±—è —É–∂–µ –±—ã–ª–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞ ‚Äú–∫–∞–∫ –Ω–∞–¥–æ –ø–æ –æ—â—É—â–µ–Ω–∏—è–º‚Äù (–ø–æ–ª—è + –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ + –ª–æ–≥), –ª–æ–≥–∏—á–Ω–µ–µ –æ–ø–∏—Ä–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—ã–π UI/UX, –∞ –Ω–æ–≤—É—é ‚Äú–¥–∏–ø–ª–æ–º–Ω—É—é —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å‚Äù —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –≤ –¥–≤–∏–∂–∫–µ (Playwright + —Å—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏–∏ + –ø–∞—Ä–∞–ª–ª–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å + –æ—Ç—á—ë—Ç—ã + Telegram).

‚úÖ –û—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å —Ä–µ–ø–æ–∑–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π WebLoadTester –∫–∞–∫ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π

–ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥ –∫ –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é –≤ UI

—Ç–µ–º—É/—Å—Ç–∏–ª–∏/—à—Ä–∏—Ñ—Ç—ã (—á—Ç–æ–±—ã –Ω–µ –±—ã–ª–æ ‚Äú—á—ë—Ä–Ω–æ–µ –Ω–∞ —á—ë—Ä–Ω–æ–º‚Äù –∏ ‚Äú–∫–≤–∞–¥—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–∫–∏ –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–æ —Ä—É—Å—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ‚Äù)

<Window xmlns="https://github.com/avaloniaui"

          <!-- Timeout placed below to keep grid simple -->
          <NumericUpDown Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="4" x:Name="TimeoutUpDown" Minimum="1" Maximum="600"

            <CheckBox x:Name="ScreenshotCheckBox" Content="–°–∫—Ä–∏–Ω—à–æ—Ç –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω–∞" />

2) MVP: ‚Äú–ø–µ—Ä–µ–π—Ç–∏ –Ω–∞ google.com –∏ –Ω–∞–∂–∞—Ç—å ‚Äò–ú–Ω–µ –ø–æ–≤–µ–∑—ë—Ç!‚Äô‚Äù (MainWindow.axaml.cs)
–≠—Ç–æ –º–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏–π —à–∞–≥: –±–µ–∑ MVVM, –±–µ–∑ JSON, –±–µ–∑ Telegram ‚Äî –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ —á—Ç–æ–±—ã Playwright —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–ª –∏ —Ç—ã —É–∂–µ –º–æ–≥ –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å ‚Äú—Ñ–∏—à–∫—É‚Äù —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—é.

using System;
using System.Collections.ObjectModel;
using System.IO;
using System.Linq;
using System.Threading;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using Avalonia.Controls;
using Avalonia.Interactivity;
using Avalonia.Threading;
using Microsoft.Playwright;

namespace WebLoadTester.Views;

public partial class MainWindow : Window
{
    private readonly ObservableCollection<string> _selectors = new();
    private readonly ObservableCollection<string> _log = new();

    private CancellationTokenSource? _cts;

    // –¢–≤–æ–π —Å–µ–ª–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä (–∫–∞–∫ –ø—Ä–æ—Å–∏–ª)
    private const string GoogleLuckySelector =
        "body > div.L3eUgb > div.o3j99.ikrT4e.om7nvf > form > div:nth-child(1) > div.A8SBwf > div.FPdoLc.lJ9FBc > center > input.RNmpXc";

    public MainWindow()
    {
        InitializeComponent();

        // –ø—Ä–∏–≤—è–∑–∫–∞ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ü–∏–π –∫ ListBox
        SelectorsList.ItemsSource = _selectors;
        LogList.ItemsSource = _log;

        // –¥–µ—Ñ–æ–ª—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è MVP
        UrlTextBox.Text = "https://www.google.com";
        NameTextBox.Text = "PC-Name";
        VersionText.Text = "v1.0";

        TotalRunsUpDown.Value = 1;
        ConcurrencyUpDown.Value = 1;
        TimeoutUpDown.Value = 10;

        HeadlessCheckBox.IsChecked = true;
        ScreenshotCheckBox.IsChecked = true;

        _selectors.Add(GoogleLuckySelector);

        AddLog("–ü—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞–ø—É—â–µ–Ω–æ");

        // —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–æ–∫
        AddSelectorBtn.Click += AddSelector_Click;
        RemoveSelectorBtn.Click += RemoveSelector_Click;
        UpSelectorBtn.Click += UpSelector_Click;
        DownSelectorBtn.Click += DownSelector_Click;

        StartBtn.Click += Start_Click;
        StopBtn.Click += Stop_Click;

        // –ø–æ–∫–∞ –∑–∞–≥–ª—É—à–∫–∏:
        LoadScenarioBtn.Click += (_, __) => AddLog("LOAD: –ø–æ–∑–∂–µ (JSON)");
        SaveScenarioBtn.Click += (_, __) => AddLog("SAVE: –ø–æ–∑–∂–µ (JSON)");
        TelegramSettingsBtn.Click += (_, __) => AddLog("Telegram Settings: –ø–æ–∑–∂–µ (–æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –æ–∫–Ω–æ)");
    }

    private void AddLog(string message)
    {
        var line = $"[{DateTime.Now:HH:mm:ss}] {message}";
        Dispatcher.UIThread.Post(() =>
        {
            _log.Add(line);
            // –∞–≤—Ç–æ-—Å–∫—Ä–æ–ª–ª –≤–Ω–∏–∑
            var last = _log.LastOrDefault();
            if (last != null)
                LogList.ScrollIntoView(last);
        });
    }

    private void SetStatus(string status, string progress)
    {
        Dispatcher.UIThread.Post(() =>
        {
            StatusText.Text = $"Status: {status}";
            ProgressText.Text = $"Progress: {progress}";
        });
    }

    private void AddSelector_Click(object? sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        _selectors.Add("css_selector_here");
        SelectorsList.SelectedIndex = _selectors.Count - 1;
    }

    private void RemoveSelector_Click(object? sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        if (SelectorsList.SelectedIndex >= 0 && SelectorsList.SelectedIndex < _selectors.Count)
            _selectors.RemoveAt(SelectorsList.SelectedIndex);
    }

    private void UpSelector_Click(object? sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        var i = SelectorsList.SelectedIndex;
        if (i > 0)
        {
            (_selectors[i - 1], _selectors[i]) = (_selectors[i], _selectors[i - 1]);
            SelectorsList.SelectedIndex = i - 1;
        }
    }

    private void DownSelector_Click(object? sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        var i = SelectorsList.SelectedIndex;
        if (i >= 0 && i < _selectors.Count - 1)
        {
            (_selectors[i + 1], _selectors[i]) = (_selectors[i], _selectors[i + 1]);
            SelectorsList.SelectedIndex = i + 1;
        }
    }

    private async void Start_Click(object? sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        if (_cts != null)
            return;

        _cts = new CancellationTokenSource();

        try
        {
            SetStatus("Running", "0/1");
            await RunGoogleLuckyOnceAsync();
            SetStatus("Done", "1/1");
        }
        catch (Exception ex)
        {
            AddLog($"–û—à–∏–±–∫–∞: {ex.Message}");
            SetStatus("Error", "0/1");
        }
        finally
        {
            _cts.Dispose();
            _cts = null;
        }
    }

    private void Stop_Click(object? sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        _cts?.Cancel();
        AddLog("Stop: –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å –Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–º–µ–Ω—É");
        SetStatus("Stopping", "...");
    }

    private async Task RunGoogleLuckyOnceAsync()
    {
        var url = (UrlTextBox.Text ?? "https://www.google.com").Trim();
        var timeoutSec = (int)(TimeoutUpDown.Value ?? 10);
        var headless = HeadlessCheckBox.IsChecked ?? true;
        var makeScreenshot = ScreenshotCheckBox.IsChecked ?? false;

        var selector = _selectors.FirstOrDefault()?.Trim();
        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(selector))
            throw new InvalidOperationException("CSS selector –ø—É—Å—Ç–æ–π.");

        AddLog("Playwright: –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è");
        using var playwright = await Playwright.CreateAsync();

        await using var browser = await playwright.Chromium.LaunchAsync(new BrowserTypeLaunchOptions
        {
            Headless = headless
        });

        var context = await browser.NewContextAsync(new BrowserNewContextOptions
        {
            IgnoreHTTPSErrors = true
        });

        var page = await context.NewPageAsync();
        page.SetDefaultTimeout(timeoutSec * 1000);

        AddLog($"–ü–µ—Ä–µ—Ö–æ–¥: {url}");
        await page.GotoAsync(url, new PageGotoOptions { WaitUntil = WaitUntilState.DOMContentLoaded });

        // –ù–∞ Google –∏–Ω–æ–≥–¥–∞ –≤—ã–ª–µ–∑–∞–µ—Ç consent-–±–∞–Ω–Ω–µ—Ä. –ü—ã—Ç–∞–µ–º—Å—è –∑–∞–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—å (–Ω–µ –∫—Ä–∏—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ –µ—Å–ª–∏ –Ω–µ –Ω–∞—à–ª–∏).
        await TryDismissGoogleConsentAsync(page);

        AddLog("–û–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ '–ú–Ω–µ –ø–æ–≤–µ–∑—ë—Ç!'");
        await page.Locator(selector).WaitForAsync(new LocatorWaitForOptions
        {
            State = WaitForSelectorState.Visible,
            Timeout = timeoutSec * 1000
        });

        AddLog("–ö–ª–∏–∫ –ø–æ –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–µ");
        await page.Locator(selector).ClickAsync();

        // –Ω–µ–±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π ‚Äú—Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ç–æ—Ä‚Äù
        await page.WaitForLoadStateAsync(LoadState.DOMContentLoaded);

        AddLog($"–†–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç URL: {page.Url}");

        if (makeScreenshot)
        {
            Directory.CreateDirectory("screenshots");
            var path = Path.Combine("screenshots", $"google_lucky_{DateTime.Now:yyyyMMdd_HHmmss}.png");
            await page.ScreenshotAsync(new PageScreenshotOptions { Path = path, FullPage = true });
            AddLog($"–°–∫—Ä–∏–Ω—à–æ—Ç —Å–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω—ë–Ω: {path}");
        }

        await context.CloseAsync();
        AddLog("–ë—Ä–∞—É–∑–µ—Ä –∑–∞–∫—Ä—ã—Ç");
    }

    private async Task TryDismissGoogleConsentAsync(IPage page)
    {
        string[] candidates =
        {
            "button:has-text(\"Accept all\")",
            "button:has-text(\"I agree\")",
            "button:has-text(\"–ü—Ä–∏–Ω—è—Ç—å –≤—Å–µ\")",
            "button:has-text(\"–°–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–µ–Ω\")",
        };

        foreach (var c in candidates)
        {
            try
            {
                var loc = page.Locator(c);
                if (await loc.CountAsync() > 0)
                {
                    await loc.First.ClickAsync(new LocatorClickOptions { Timeout = 2000 });
                    AddLog("Google consent: –∑–∞–∫—Ä—ã—Ç");
                    break;
                }
            }
            catch
            {
                // –∏–≥–Ω–æ—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ–º
            }
        }
    }
}

–°—Ç–∞–≤—å Microsoft.Playwright, –∞ –Ω–µ PlaywrightSharp (—É PlaywrightSharp —É —Ç–µ–±—è –∏ –±—ã–ª 400 –Ω–∞ —Å–∫–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏).

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Collections.ObjectModel;
using System.IO;
using System.Linq;
using System.Threading;
using System.Threading.Channels;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using Avalonia.Controls;

using Microsoft.Playwright;

namespace WebLoadTester.Views;

public partial class MainWindow : Window
{
    // ===== UI collections =====
    private readonly ObservableCollection<string> _selectors = new();
    private readonly ObservableCollection<string> _log = new();

    // ===== Logging via Channel =====
    private readonly Channel<string> _logChannel = Channel.CreateUnbounded<string>(new UnboundedChannelOptions
    {
        SingleReader = true,
        SingleWriter = false,
        AllowSynchronousContinuations = true
    });

    private CancellationTokenSource? _runCts;
    private CancellationTokenSource? _logCts;

    public MainWindow()
    {
        InitializeComponent();

        // Bind ItemsSource (–ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫—Ä—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –¥–µ–º–æ-—ç–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –∏–∑ XAML)
        SelectorsList.ItemsSource = _selectors;
        LogList.ItemsSource = _log;

        // Defaults for MVP
        UrlTextBox.Text = "https://www.google.com";
        NameTextBox.Text = Environment.MachineName;

        TotalRunsTextBox.Text = "1";
        ConcurrencyTextBox.Text = "1";
        TimeoutTextBox.Text = "15";

        HeadlessCheckBox.IsChecked = true;
        ScreenshotCheckBox.IsChecked = true;

        // Put your requested selector as first step (–µ—Å–ª–∏ —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –ø—É—Å—Ç–æ–π)
        if (_selectors.Count == 0)
        {
            _selectors.Add("body > div.L3eUgb > div.o3j99.ikrT4e.om7nvf > form > div:nth-child(1) > div.A8SBwf > div.FPdoLc.lJ9FBc > center > input.RNmpXc");
        }

        // Wire buttons
        AddSelectorBtn.Click += AddSelectorBtn_Click;
        RemoveSelectorBtn.Click += RemoveSelectorBtn_Click;
        UpSelectorBtn.Click += UpSelectorBtn_Click;
        DownSelectorBtn.Click += DownSelectorBtn_Click;

        StartBtn.Click += StartBtn_Click;

        LoadScenarioBtn.Click += (_, __) => EnqueueLog("LOAD scenario.json ‚Äî –ø–æ–∑–∂–µ");
        SaveScenarioBtn.Click += (_, __) => EnqueueLog("SAVE scenario.json ‚Äî –ø–æ–∑–∂–µ");

        // Start log reader loop
        _logCts = new CancellationTokenSource();

        SetStatus("Idle", "0/0");
        EnqueueLog("–ü—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞–ø—É—â–µ–Ω–æ");
    }

    }

    private void RemoveSelectorBtn_Click(object? sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        var i = SelectorsList.SelectedIndex;
        if (i < 0 || i >= _selectors.Count) return;

    private void UpSelectorBtn_Click(object? sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        var i = SelectorsList.SelectedIndex;
        if (i <= 0 || i >= _selectors.Count) return;

        (_selectors[i - 1], _selectors[i]) = (_selectors[i], _selectors[i - 1]);
        SelectorsList.SelectedIndex = i - 1;
        EnqueueLog("–®–∞–≥ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ—â—ë–Ω –≤–≤–µ—Ä—Ö");
    }

    private void DownSelectorBtn_Click(object? sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        var i = SelectorsList.SelectedIndex;
        if (i < 0 || i >= _selectors.Count - 1) return;

        (_selectors[i + 1], _selectors[i]) = (_selectors[i], _selectors[i + 1]);
        SelectorsList.SelectedIndex = i + 1;
        EnqueueLog("–®–∞–≥ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ—â—ë–Ω –≤–Ω–∏–∑");
    }

    private async void StartBtn_Click(object? sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        if (_runCts != null)
        {
            EnqueueLog("–£–∂–µ –∑–∞–ø—É—â–µ–Ω–æ");
            return;
        }

        _runCts = new CancellationTokenSource();

        try
        {
            ToggleUi(isRunning: true);

            var url = (UrlTextBox.Text ?? "").Trim();
            if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(url))
            {
                EnqueueLog("URL –ø—É—Å—Ç–æ–π ‚Äî –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ –æ—Ç–º–µ–Ω—ë–Ω");
                return;
            }

            var selectors = _selectors.Where(s => !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(s)).ToList();
            if (selectors.Count == 0)
            {
                EnqueueLog("–°–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ —Å–µ–ª–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≤ –ø—É—Å—Ç–æ–π ‚Äî –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ –æ—Ç–º–µ–Ω—ë–Ω");
                return;
            }

            var totalRuns = ParseIntOrDefault(TotalRunsTextBox.Text, 1, 1, 1_000_000);
            var concurrency = ParseIntOrDefault(ConcurrencyTextBox.Text, 1, 1, 50);
            var timeoutSec = ParseIntOrDefault(TimeoutTextBox.Text, 15, 1, 600);
            var headless = HeadlessCheckBox.IsChecked ?? true;
            var screenshot = ScreenshotCheckBox.IsChecked ?? false;

            SetStatus("Running", $"0/{totalRuns}");
            EnqueueLog($"–°—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç: url={url}, totalRuns={totalRuns}, concurrency={concurrency}, timeout={timeoutSec}s, headless={headless}, screenshot={screenshot}");

            await RunWithPlaywrightAsync(
                url: url,
                selectors: selectors,
                totalRuns: totalRuns,
                concurrency: concurrency,
                timeoutSeconds: timeoutSec,
                headless: headless,
                screenshotAfterRun: screenshot,
                token: _runCts.Token);

            SetStatus("Done", $"{totalRuns}/{totalRuns}");
            EnqueueLog("–ì–æ—Ç–æ–≤–æ");
        }
        catch (OperationCanceledException)
        {
            SetStatus("Stopped", "‚Äî");
            EnqueueLog("–û—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–æ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–º");
        }
        catch (Exception ex)
        {
            SetStatus("Error", "‚Äî");
            EnqueueLog($"–û—à–∏–±–∫–∞: {ex.GetType().Name}: {ex.Message}");
        }
        finally
        {
            _runCts?.Dispose();
            _runCts = null;
            ToggleUi(isRunning: false);
        }
    }

    private void StopBtn_Click(object? sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        if (_runCts == null) return;

        EnqueueLog("Stop: –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å –æ—Ç–º–µ–Ω—ã");
        SetStatus("Stopping", "‚Ä¶");
        _runCts.Cancel();
    }

    private void RestartBtn_Click(object? sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        // –ú–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π ‚Äúrestart‚Äù: –µ—Å–ª–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç ‚Äî –æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å –∏ –ø–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∏—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—É—Ç—å –∑–∞–Ω–æ–≤–æ
        if (_runCts != null)

            return;
        }

        // –µ—Å–ª–∏ –Ω–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç ‚Äî –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç
        StartBtn_Click(sender, e);
    }

    // ===========================
    // Playwright runner (TPL)
    // ===========================

    private async Task RunWithPlaywrightAsync(
        string url,
        List<string> selectors,
        int totalRuns,
        int concurrency,
        int timeoutSeconds,
        bool headless,
        bool screenshotAfterRun,
        CancellationToken token)
    {
        // –ì–ª–æ–±–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —Å—á—ë—Ç—á–∏–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω–æ–≤/—É—Å–ø–µ—Ö–æ–≤/–æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫
        int runCounter = 0;
        int ok = 0;
        int fail = 0;

        // –ü–æ–¥–Ω–∏–º–µ–º –æ–¥–∏–Ω –±—Ä–∞—É–∑–µ—Ä, –∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç—ã/—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü—ã ‚Äî –Ω–∞ –≤–æ—Ä–∫–µ—Ä–∞—Ö
        EnqueueLog("Playwright: CreateAsync()");
        using var playwright = await Playwright.CreateAsync();

        EnqueueLog("Playwright: Launch Chromium");
        await using var browser = await playwright.Chromium.LaunchAsync(new BrowserTypeLaunchOptions
        {
            Headless = headless
        });

        // –í–æ—Ä–∫–µ—Ä—ã
        var tasks = new List<Task>(concurrency);
        for (int workerId = 1; workerId <= concurrency; workerId++)
        {
            var id = workerId;
            tasks.Add(Task.Run(async () =>
            {
                // –æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç –Ω–∞ –≤–æ—Ä–∫–µ—Ä
                await using var context = await browser.NewContextAsync(new BrowserNewContextOptions
                {
                    IgnoreHTTPSErrors = true
                });

                while (true)
                {
                    token.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();

                    var current = Interlocked.Increment(ref runCounter);
                    if (current > totalRuns) break;

                    try
                    {
                        EnqueueLog($"[W{id}] Run {current}/{totalRuns}: open page");
                        var page = await context.NewPageAsync();
                        page.SetDefaultTimeout(timeoutSeconds * 1000);

                        await page.GotoAsync(url, new PageGotoOptions { WaitUntil = WaitUntilState.DOMContentLoaded });
                        await TryDismissGoogleConsentAsync(page);

                        // –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç—å —à–∞–≥–∏
                        foreach (var sel in selectors)
                        {
                            token.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();

                            EnqueueLog($"[W{id}] wait: {Short(sel)}");
                            var loc = page.Locator(sel);
                            await loc.WaitForAsync(new LocatorWaitForOptions
                            {
                                State = WaitForSelectorState.Visible,
                                Timeout = timeoutSeconds * 1000
                            });

                            EnqueueLog($"[W{id}] click: {Short(sel)}");
                            await loc.ClickAsync();
                            await page.WaitForLoadStateAsync(LoadState.DOMContentLoaded, new PageWaitForLoadStateOptions
                            {
                                Timeout = timeoutSeconds * 1000
                            });
                        }

                        EnqueueLog($"[W{id}] done, url={page.Url}");

                        if (screenshotAfterRun)
                        {
                            Directory.CreateDirectory("screenshots");
                            var file = Path.Combine("screenshots", $"run_{current:0000}_w{id}_{DateTime.Now:yyyyMMdd_HHmmss}.png");
                            await page.ScreenshotAsync(new PageScreenshotOptions { Path = file, FullPage = true });
                            EnqueueLog($"[W{id}] screenshot: {file}");
                        }

                        await page.CloseAsync();

                        Interlocked.Increment(ref ok);
                        UpdateProgress(ok + fail, totalRuns, ok, fail);
                    }
                    catch (OperationCanceledException)
                    {
                        throw;
                    }
                    catch (Exception ex)
                    {
                        Interlocked.Increment(ref fail);
                        EnqueueLog($"[W{id}] FAIL run {current}: {ex.GetType().Name}: {ex.Message}");
                        UpdateProgress(ok + fail, totalRuns, ok, fail);
                    }
                }

                EnqueueLog($"[W{id}] worker finished");
            }, token));
        }

        await Task.WhenAll(tasks);
        EnqueueLog($"–ò—Ç–æ–≥: OK={ok}, FAIL={fail}, TOTAL={totalRuns}");
    }

    private async Task TryDismissGoogleConsentAsync(IPage page)
    {
        // –ù–µ–±–æ–ª—å—à–∞—è ‚Äú–ø–æ–º–æ—â—å‚Äù –¥–ª—è Google consent-–±–∞–Ω–Ω–µ—Ä–∞.
        // –ï—Å–ª–∏ –µ–≥–æ –Ω–µ—Ç ‚Äî –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ —Ç–∏—Ö–æ –≤—ã—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º.
        string[] candidates =
        {
            "button:has-text(\"Accept all\")",
            "button:has-text(\"I agree\")",
            "button:has-text(\"–ü—Ä–∏–Ω—è—Ç—å –≤—Å–µ\")",
            "button:has-text(\"–°–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–µ–Ω\")",
            "button:has-text(\"–ü—Ä–∏–Ω—è—Ç—å\")"
        };

        foreach (var c in candidates)
        {
            try
            {
                var loc = page.Locator(c);
                if (await loc.CountAsync() > 0)
                {
                    await loc.First.ClickAsync(new LocatorClickOptions { Timeout = 2000 });
                    EnqueueLog("Google consent –∑–∞–∫—Ä—ã—Ç");
                    break;
                }
            }
            catch
            {
                // ignore
            }
        }
    }

    private void EnqueueLog(string message)
    {
        var line = $"[{DateTime.Now:HH:mm:ss}] {message}";
        _logChannel.Writer.TryWrite(line);
    }

    private async Task LogReaderLoopAsync(CancellationToken token)
    {
        try
        {
            while (await _logChannel.Reader.WaitToReadAsync(token))
            {
                while (_logChannel.Reader.TryRead(out var line))
                {
                    await Dispatcher.UIThread.InvokeAsync(() =>
                    {
                        _log.Add(line);

                        // –û–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–∏–º —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—Ä –ª–æ–≥–∞ (—á—Ç–æ–±—ã UI –Ω–µ —Ä–∞—Å–ø—É—Ö–∞–ª)
                        if (_log.Count > 3000)
                            _log.RemoveAt(0);

                        // –ê–≤—Ç–æ—Å–∫—Ä–æ–ª–ª –≤–Ω–∏–∑
                        if (_log.Count > 0)
                            LogList.ScrollIntoView(_log[^1]);
                    });
                }
            }
        }
        catch (OperationCanceledException)
        {
            // ignore
        }
    }

    private void SetStatus(string status, string progress)
    {

            StatusText.Text = $"Status: {status}";

    private void UpdateProgress(int done, int total, int ok, int fail)
    {

        {

        });
    }

    private void ToggleUi(bool isRunning)
    {

            StartBtn.IsEnabled = !isRunning;
            RestartBtn.IsEnabled = !isRunning; // –Ω–∞ MVP –ø—É—Å—Ç—å –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–µ–Ω —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –∫–æ–≥–¥–∞ –Ω–µ –∏–¥–µ—Ç
            StopBtn.IsEnabled = isRunning;

            LoadScenarioBtn.IsEnabled = !isRunning;
            SaveScenarioBtn.IsEnabled = !isRunning;

            AddSelectorBtn.IsEnabled = !isRunning;
            RemoveSelectorBtn.IsEnabled = !isRunning;
            UpSelectorBtn.IsEnabled = !isRunning;
            DownSelectorBtn.IsEnabled = !isRunning;
        });
    }

    private static int ParseIntOrDefault(string? s, int @default, int min, int max)
    {
        if (!int.TryParse((s ?? "").Trim(), out var v))
            v = @default;

        if (v < min) v = min;
        if (v > max) v = max;
        return v;
    }

    private static string Short(string selector)
    {
        selector = selector.Trim();
        if (selector.Length <= 70) return selector;
        return selector.Substring(0, 67) + "...";
    }
}

–ó–∞—á–µ–º: –∏–º–∏—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫—É –∏–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ UI (—Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –±—Ä–∞—É–∑–µ—Ä—ã/–∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç—ã), –∞ –Ω–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ HTTP-–∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞–º–∏.

–ö–∞–∫ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è:

‚Äú–í—Å–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω–æ–≤‚Äù = —Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Ä–∞–∑ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Å—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏–π

‚Äú–ü–∞—Ä–∞–ª–ª–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ (1‚Äì50)‚Äù = —Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –≤–æ—Ä–∫–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ (–≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π)

‚Äú–¢–∞–π–º–∞—É—Ç‚Äù = —Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –∂–¥–∞—Ç—å –ø–æ—è–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —ç–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ (–∏/–∏–ª–∏ —à–∞–≥–æ–≤)

3) –í–∏–¥—ã —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è (–¥–ª—è ‚Äú—Å–æ–ª–∏–¥–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏‚Äù –Ω–∞ –¥–∏–∞–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–µ –∏ –≤ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–µ –í–ö–†)
–° —Ç–æ—á–∫–∏ –∑—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ ‚Äî —ç—Ç–æ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–µ–≥–∏–∏ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞, –Ω–æ —è–¥—Ä–æ –æ–¥–Ω–æ –∏ —Ç–æ –∂–µ (—Å—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏–π + –ø–∞—Ä–∞–ª–ª–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å + –ª–æ–≥ + –æ—Ç—á—ë—Ç):

E2E: –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Å—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏–π N —Ä–∞–∑ (–æ–±—ã—á–Ω—ã–π —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º).

Load (–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–æ—á–Ω–æ–µ): –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–ª–ª–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –≤–æ—Ä–∫–µ—Ä–æ–≤, —Ñ–∏–∫—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —É—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –ø–∞—Ä–∞–ª–ª–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏.

Stress (—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—Å—Å): –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫—É —Å—Ç—É–ø–µ–Ω—è–º–∏ (—à–∞–≥ –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏, –ø–∞—É–∑–∞, runs/level) –∏ —Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–µ—Ç—å, –≥–¥–µ –ª–æ–º–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è.

Endurance (–≤—ã–Ω–æ—Å–ª–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç—å): –≥–æ–Ω—è—Ç—å —Å—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏–π –∑–∞–¥–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è (–º–∏–Ω—É—Ç—ã), –≤—ã—è–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –¥–µ–≥—Ä–∞–¥–∞—Ü–∏—é/—É—Ç–µ—á–∫–∏/–Ω–µ—Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å.

4) –ü–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫ —à–∞–≥–∞
–ó–∞—á–µ–º: —Å–∞–π—Ç –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç —Ç–æ—Ä–º–æ–∑–∏—Ç—å/–∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ –ø–æ—è–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ–∑–¥–Ω–æ/—ç–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç –∏–Ω–æ–≥–¥–∞ –Ω–µ –ø–æ—è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è. –¢–µ—Å—Ç–µ—Ä —Ä–µ—à–∞–µ—Ç, —á—Ç–æ –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º–µ.

from pathlib import Path

def svg_rect(x,y,w,h,rx=6,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#C8C8C8",sw=1,opacity=1.0):
    return f'<rect x="{x}" y="{y}" width="{w}" height="{h}" rx="{rx}" fill="{fill}" stroke="{stroke}" stroke-width="{sw}" opacity="{opacity}"/>'

def svg_text(x,y,text,size=14,weight=400,fill="#111111",anchor="start"):
    # y is baseline; for simplicity keep baseline
    return (f'<text x="{x}" y="{y}" fill="{fill}" font-family="Inter, Segoe UI, Arial" '
            f'font-size="{size}" font-weight="{weight}" text-anchor="{anchor}">{text}</text>')

def svg_line(x1,y1,x2,y2,stroke="#C8C8C8",sw=1):
    return f'<line x1="{x1}" y1="{y1}" x2="{x2}" y2="{y2}" stroke="{stroke}" stroke-width="{sw}"/>'

def make_main_window_svg(path: Path, active_tab: str):
    W, H = 1440, 900
    padding = 16
    topbar_h = 64
    log_h = 220
    right_w = 340
    left_w = 260
    gap = 12
    
    content_y = padding + topbar_h + gap
    content_h = H - content_y - padding
    center_h = content_h - log_h - gap
    
    x0 = padding
    y0 = padding
    
    # Base frame background
    elements = []
    elements.append(f'<rect x="0" y="0" width="{W}" height="{H}" fill="#F7F7F7"/>')
    elements.append(svg_rect(8,8,W-16,H-16,rx=14,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    
    # Top bar
    elements.append(svg_rect(x0, y0, W-2*padding, topbar_h, rx=10, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    elements.append(svg_text(x0+12, y0+24, "WebLoadTester", size=16, weight=600))
    # Buttons
    bx = x0+180
    by = y0+16
    btn_w, btn_h = 92, 32
    def btn(x, label, kind="primary"):
        if kind=="primary":
            fill="#2563EB"; stroke="#2563EB"; txt="#FFFFFF"
        elif kind=="danger":
            fill="#DC2626"; stroke="#DC2626"; txt="#FFFFFF"
        else:
            fill="#FFFFFF"; stroke="#C8C8C8"; txt="#111111"
        return (svg_rect(x, by, btn_w, btn_h, rx=8, fill=fill, stroke=stroke) +
                svg_text(x+btn_w/2, by+21, label, size=13, weight=600, fill=txt, anchor="middle"))
    elements.append(btn(bx, "Start", "primary"))
    elements.append(btn(bx+btn_w+10, "Stop", "danger"))
    elements.append(btn(bx+2*(btn_w+10), "Restart", "secondary"))
    # Status & progress
    elements.append(svg_text(W-2*padding-300, y0+24, "Status:", size=13, weight=600, fill="#444444"))
    elements.append(svg_rect(W-2*padding-240, y0+10, 120, 28, rx=14, fill="#EEF2FF", stroke="#C7D2FE"))
    elements.append(svg_text(W-2*padding-180, y0+29, "Idle", size=13, weight=700, fill="#1D4ED8", anchor="middle"))
    elements.append(svg_text(W-2*padding-110, y0+24, "Progress 0/0", size=13, weight=600, fill="#444444"))
    
    # Tabs row
    tabs_y = content_y
    tabs_h = 44
    elements.append(svg_rect(x0, tabs_y, W-2*padding-right_w-gap, tabs_h, rx=10, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    tabs = ["UI Testing", "HTTP Testing", "Network & Security", "Reports"]
    tx = x0+12
    for t in tabs:
        tw = 150 if t!="Network & Security" else 190
        is_active = (t==active_tab)
        fill = "#E5E7EB" if is_active else "#FFFFFF"
        stroke = "#C8C8C8" if is_active else "#E0E0E0"
        elements.append(svg_rect(tx, tabs_y+8, tw, 28, rx=8, fill=fill, stroke=stroke))
        elements.append(svg_text(tx+tw/2, tabs_y+28, t, size=13, weight=700 if is_active else 600, anchor="middle"))
        tx += tw + 10
    
    # Right Telegram panel (always visible)
    right_x = W - padding - right_w
    elements.append(svg_rect(right_x, tabs_y, right_w, content_h, rx=10, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    elements.append(svg_text(right_x+12, tabs_y+24, "Telegram Settings", size=14, weight=700))
    # Telegram fields mock
    fy = tabs_y+44
    def field(label, y, h=32):
        elements.append(svg_text(right_x+12, y-6, label, size=12, weight=600, fill="#444444"))
        elements.append(svg_rect(right_x+12, y, right_w-24, h, rx=8, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#C8C8C8"))
    # toggles as checkboxes
    def checkbox(label, y):
        elements.append(svg_rect(right_x+12, y-14, 16, 16, rx=4, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#C8C8C8"))
        elements.append(svg_text(right_x+36, y-2, label, size=13, weight=600, fill="#111111"))
    checkbox("Enable Telegram", fy+18)
    field("Bot Token", fy+56)
    field("Chat Id", fy+104)
    checkbox("Send on Start", fy+158)
    checkbox("Send on Finish", fy+186)
    checkbox("Send on Error", fy+214)
    field("Progress Notify Mode (Off / Every N / Every T)", fy+250, h=36)
    field("Attachments Mode (None / On error / Final / Every N)", fy+306, h=36)
    field("Rate limit (seconds)", fy+362)
    elements.append(svg_text(right_x+12, fy+420, "Note: Telegram is a global policy over modules.", size=11, weight=500, fill="#666666"))
    
    # Center region (below tabs) ‚Äî left module list + settings panel + log
    center_x = x0
    center_w = W - 2*padding - right_w - gap
    
    # Upper main area (modules + settings)
    upper_y = tabs_y + tabs_h + gap
    upper_h = center_h - tabs_h - gap
    
    # Left module list
    elements.append(svg_rect(center_x, upper_y, left_w, upper_h, rx=10, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    elements.append(svg_text(center_x+12, upper_y+24, "Modules", size=14, weight=700))
    # Module items depend on tab
    if active_tab=="UI Testing":
        items = ["UiScenario", "UiSnapshot", "UiTiming"]
        selected = "UiScenario"
    elif active_tab=="HTTP Testing":
        items = ["HttpFunctional", "HttpPerformance", "HttpAssets"]
        selected = "HttpFunctional"
    elif active_tab=="Network & Security":
        items = ["NetDiagnostics", "Availability", "SecurityBaseline", "Preflight"]
        selected = "NetDiagnostics"
    else:
        items = ["Last runs", "Open reports folder", "Compare runs"]
        selected = "Last runs"
    iy = upper_y+40
    for it in items:
        is_sel = it==selected
        elements.append(svg_rect(center_x+12, iy, left_w-24, 32, rx=8, fill="#E5E7EB" if is_sel else "#FFFFFF", stroke="#C8C8C8"))
        elements.append(svg_text(center_x+24, iy+22, it, size=13, weight=700 if is_sel else 600))
        iy += 40
    
    # Settings panel
    settings_x = center_x + left_w + gap
    settings_w = center_w - left_w - gap
    elements.append(svg_rect(settings_x, upper_y, settings_w, upper_h, rx=10, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    elements.append(svg_text(settings_x+12, upper_y+24, f"Settings ‚Äî {selected}", size=14, weight=700))
    
    # Draw settings mock depending on selected
    sx = settings_x+12
    sy = upper_y+44
    col_w = (settings_w-24-12)/2
    def input_box(x,y,label,w,h=32):
        elements.append(svg_text(x, y-6, label, size=12, weight=600, fill="#444444"))
        elements.append(svg_rect(x, y, w, h, rx=8, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#C8C8C8"))
    def toggle_row(x,y,label):
        elements.append(svg_rect(x, y, 16, 16, rx=4, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#C8C8C8"))
        elements.append(svg_text(x+24, y+13, label, size=13, weight=600))
    if selected=="UiScenario":
        input_box(sx, sy, "Start URL", settings_w-24)
        input_box(sx, sy+52, "Test Type (E2E / Load / Stress / Endurance)", col_w)
        input_box(sx+col_w+12, sy+52, "Concurrency", col_w)
        input_box(sx, sy+104, "Runs (E2E/Load) or Minutes (Endurance)", col_w)
        input_box(sx+col_w+12, sy+104, "Stress step / pause / runs per level", col_w)
        toggle_row(sx, sy+158, "Headless browser")
        toggle_row(sx+220, sy+158, "Take screenshots")
        input_box(sx, sy+198, "Step error policy (SkipStep / StopRun / StopAll)", settings_w-24)
        # Selectors board
        elements.append(svg_text(sx, sy+242, "Click Selectors (board)", size=12, weight=700, fill="#444444"))
        board_y = sy+256
        board_h = upper_h - (board_y-upper_y) - 16
        elements.append(svg_rect(sx, board_y, settings_w-24, board_h, rx=10, fill="#FAFAFA", stroke="#E0E0E0"))
        # Header row with buttons
        elements.append(svg_text(sx+12, board_y+24, "Selectors", size=13, weight=700))
        # Add button
        abx = sx + (settings_w-24) - 100
        elements.append(svg_rect(abx, board_y+10, 88, 28, rx=8, fill="#2563EB", stroke="#2563EB"))
        elements.append(svg_text(abx+44, board_y+29, "Add", size=13, weight=700, fill="#FFFFFF", anchor="middle"))
        # Rows
        ry = board_y+48
        for i in range(5):
            elements.append(svg_rect(sx+12, ry, settings_w-24-24, 34, rx=8, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#C8C8C8"))
            elements.append(svg_text(sx+22, ry+22, f".css-selector-{i+1}", size=13, weight=500, fill="#111111"))
            # row actions (move up/down/remove)
            ax = sx + (settings_w-24) - 12 - 24*3 - 6*2
            for j,lab in enumerate(["‚Üë","‚Üì","‚úï"]):
                elements.append(svg_rect(ax + j*(24+6), ry+5, 24, 24, rx=6, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#C8C8C8"))
                elements.append(svg_text(ax + j*(24+6)+12, ry+22, lab, size=14, weight=700, anchor="middle"))
            ry += 42
        elements.append(svg_text(sx+12, board_y+board_h-14, "Tip: Up/Down can be replaced by drag-and-drop later.", size=11, weight=500, fill="#666666"))
    elif selected=="HttpFunctional":
        input_box(sx, sy, "Base URL (optional)", settings_w-24)
        input_box(sx, sy+52, "Timeout (ms)", col_w)
        input_box(sx+col_w+12, sy+52, "Concurrency (optional)", col_w)
        elements.append(svg_text(sx, sy+104, "Endpoints list", size=12, weight=700, fill="#444444"))
        table_y = sy+118
        table_h = upper_h - (table_y-upper_y) - 16
        elements.append(svg_rect(sx, table_y, settings_w-24, table_h, rx=10, fill="#FAFAFA", stroke="#E0E0E0"))
        # table header
        th = 34
        elements.append(svg_rect(sx, table_y, settings_w-24, th, rx=10, fill="#F3F4F6", stroke="#E0E0E0"))
        cols = [("Method",70),("Path/URL",360),("Asserts",220),("Expected",120),("Max ms",90)]
        cx = sx+12
        for name,wc in cols:
            elements.append(svg_text(cx, table_y+22, name, size=12, weight=700, fill="#444444"))
            cx += wc
        # rows
        ry = table_y+th+10
        for i in range(5):
            elements.append(svg_rect(sx+12, ry, settings_w-24-24, 34, rx=8, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#C8C8C8"))
            elements.append(svg_text(sx+22, ry+22, f"GET   /api/health   status==200", size=12, weight=500))
            ry += 42
    elif selected=="NetDiagnostics":
        input_box(sx, sy, "Host / Domain / IP", settings_w-24)
        input_box(sx, sy+52, "Ports (comma-separated, e.g., 80,443)", settings_w-24)
        toggle_row(sx, sy+110, "DNS resolve")
        toggle_row(sx+160, sy+110, "TCP connect")
        toggle_row(sx+330, sy+110, "TLS handshake / expiry")
        elements.append(svg_text(sx, sy+156, "Results preview", size=12, weight=700, fill="#444444"))
        box_y = sy+170
        box_h = upper_h - (box_y-upper_y) - 16
        elements.append(svg_rect(sx, box_y, settings_w-24, box_h, rx=10, fill="#FAFAFA", stroke="#E0E0E0"))
        elements.append(svg_text(sx+12, box_y+24, "DNS: ‚Äî   TCP: ‚Äî   TLS: ‚Äî", size=13, weight=600, fill="#111111"))
    else:
        elements.append(svg_text(sx, sy+16, "This tab is a placeholder in the Figma draft.", size=13, weight=500, fill="#666666"))
    
    # Log viewer (bottom)
    log_y = upper_y + upper_h + gap
    elements.append(svg_rect(center_x, log_y, center_w, log_h, rx=10, fill="#0B0B0B", stroke="#202020"))
    elements.append(svg_text(center_x+12, log_y+24, "Live Log", size=14, weight=700, fill="#F3F4F6"))
    # log lines
    ly = log_y+48
    for i in range(7):
        elements.append(svg_text(center_x+12, ly, f"[00:00:{i:02d}] INFO  Sample log message {i+1}", size=12, weight=500, fill="#E5E7EB"))
        ly += 20
    elements.append(svg_text(center_x+12, log_y+log_h-12, "Monospace, auto-scroll to end (optional).", size=11, weight=500, fill="#9CA3AF"))
    
    svg = f'<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="{W}" height="{H}" viewBox="0 0 {W} {H}">' + "".join(elements) + "</svg>"
    path.write_text(svg, encoding="utf-8")

    tabx = x+28
    for t,active in [("UI Testing",True),("HTTP Testing",False),("Network & Security",False),("Reports",False)]:

from pathlib import Path

def rect(x,y,w,h,rx=6,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#C8C8C8",sw=1,opacity=1.0):
    return f'<rect x="{x}" y="{y}" width="{w}" height="{h}" rx="{rx}" fill="{fill}" stroke="{stroke}" stroke-width="{sw}" opacity="{opacity}"/>'

def text(x,y,s,size=14,weight=400,fill="#111111",anchor="start"):
    # y = baseline
    s = (s.replace("&","&amp;").replace("<","&lt;").replace(">","&gt;"))
    return (f'<text x="{x}" y="{y}" fill="{fill}" font-family="Inter, Segoe UI, Arial" '
            f'font-size="{size}" font-weight="{weight}" text-anchor="{anchor}">{s}</text>')

def make_main_v2(path: Path, tab: str, telegram_open: bool):
    W, H = 1440, 900
    pad = 16
    gap = 12
    top_h = 64
    tabs_h = 44
    log_h = 220
    
    # Layout widths
    left_w = 260  # modules list
    selectors_w = 360 if tab=="UI Testing" else 0
    telegram_w = 340 if telegram_open else 0
    
    # Derived sizes
    x0 = pad
    y0 = pad
    content_y = y0 + top_h + gap
    content_h = H - content_y - pad
    center_h = content_h - log_h - gap
    
    center_w_total = W - 2*pad
    right_stack_w = selectors_w + (gap if (selectors_w and telegram_w) else 0) + telegram_w
    main_w = center_w_total - right_stack_w
    
    # Avoid negative in tiny widths (mock)
    main_w = max(main_w, 640)
    
    # Regions within main area
    tabs_y = content_y
    upper_y = tabs_y + tabs_h + gap
    upper_h = center_h - tabs_h - gap
    log_y = upper_y + upper_h + gap
    
    # Columns in upper main region
    settings_x = x0 + left_w + gap
    settings_w = main_w - left_w - gap
    
    # SVG build
    el = []
    el.append(f'<rect x="0" y="0" width="{W}" height="{H}" fill="#F7F7F7"/>')
    el.append(rect(8,8,W-16,H-16,rx=14,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    
    # Top bar
    el.append(rect(x0,y0,center_w_total,top_h,rx=10,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    el.append(text(x0+12,y0+24,"WebLoadTester",size=16,weight=700))
    
    # Core actions
    by = y0+16
    btn_w, btn_h = 92, 32
    def btn(x,label,kind="primary"):
        if kind=="primary":
            fill="#2563EB"; stroke="#2563EB"; tcol="#FFFFFF"
        elif kind=="danger":
            fill="#DC2626"; stroke="#DC2626"; tcol="#FFFFFF"
        else:
            fill="#FFFFFF"; stroke="#C8C8C8"; tcol="#111111"
        return rect(x,by,btn_w,btn_h,rx=8,fill=fill,stroke=stroke)+text(x+btn_w/2,by+21,label,size=13,weight=700,fill=tcol,anchor="middle")
    bx = x0+180
    el.append(btn(bx,"Start","primary"))
    el.append(btn(bx+btn_w+10,"Stop","danger"))
    el.append(btn(bx+2*(btn_w+10),"Restart","secondary"))
    
    # Telegram toggle button (top-right)
    tgl_w = 110
    tgl_x = x0 + center_w_total - tgl_w - 12
    tgl_fill = "#E5E7EB" if telegram_open else "#FFFFFF"
    tgl_st = "#C8C8C8"
    el.append(rect(tgl_x, by, tgl_w, btn_h, rx=8, fill=tgl_fill, stroke=tgl_st))
    el.append(text(tgl_x+tgl_w/2, by+21, "Telegram", size=13, weight=700, anchor="middle"))
    # Hint
    el.append(text(tgl_x-16, y0+24, "Panel:", size=12, weight=600, fill="#666666", anchor="end"))
    
    # Status + progress (compact, to avoid collisions)
    st_x = tgl_x - 300
    el.append(text(st_x, y0+24, "Status:", size=12, weight=700, fill="#444444"))
    el.append(rect(st_x+56, y0+10, 108, 28, rx=14, fill="#EEF2FF", stroke="#C7D2FE"))
    el.append(text(st_x+110, y0+29, "Idle", size=12, weight=800, fill="#1D4ED8", anchor="middle"))
    el.append(text(st_x+176, y0+24, "0/0", size=12, weight=700, fill="#444444"))
    
    # Tabs row (within main_w to leave room for right stack when telegram open)
    el.append(rect(x0,tabs_y,main_w,tabs_h,rx=10,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    tabs = ["UI Testing","HTTP Testing","Network & Security","Reports"]
    tx = x0+12
    for t in tabs:
        tw = 150 if t!="Network & Security" else 190
        active = (t==tab)
        el.append(rect(tx, tabs_y+8, tw, 28, rx=8,
                      fill="#E5E7EB" if active else "#FFFFFF",
                      stroke="#C8C8C8" if active else "#E0E0E0"))
        el.append(text(tx+tw/2, tabs_y+28, t, size=13, weight=700 if active else 600, anchor="middle"))
        tx += tw + 10
    
    # Left module list
    el.append(rect(x0, upper_y, left_w, upper_h, rx=10, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    el.append(text(x0+12, upper_y+24, "Modules", size=14, weight=800))
    if tab=="UI Testing":
        items = ["UiScenario", "UiSnapshot", "UiTiming"]
        selected = "UiScenario"
    elif tab=="HTTP Testing":
        items = ["HttpFunctional", "HttpPerformance", "HttpAssets"]
        selected = "HttpFunctional"
    elif tab=="Network & Security":
        items = ["NetDiagnostics", "Availability", "SecurityBaseline", "Preflight"]
        selected = "NetDiagnostics"
    else:
        items = ["Last runs", "Open reports folder", "Compare runs"]
        selected = "Last runs"
    iy = upper_y+40
    for it in items:
        sel = (it==selected)
        el.append(rect(x0+12, iy, left_w-24, 32, rx=8, fill="#E5E7EB" if sel else "#FFFFFF", stroke="#C8C8C8"))
        el.append(text(x0+24, iy+22, it, size=13, weight=800 if sel else 600))
        iy += 40
    
    # Settings (center)
    el.append(rect(settings_x, upper_y, settings_w, upper_h, rx=10, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    el.append(text(settings_x+12, upper_y+24, f"Settings ‚Äî {selected}", size=14, weight=800))
    
    # Helpers
    def input_box(x,y,label,w,h=32):
        el.append(text(x, y-6, label, size=12, weight=700, fill="#444444"))
        el.append(rect(x, y, w, h, rx=8, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#C8C8C8"))
    def checkbox(x,y,label):
        el.append(rect(x, y, 16, 16, rx=4, fill="#FFFFFF", stroke="#C8C8C8"))
        el.append(text(x+24, y+13, label, size=13, weight=600))
    
    sx = settings_x+12
    sy = upper_y+44
    col_gap = 12
    col_w = (settings_w-24-col_gap)/2
    
    if selected=="UiScenario":
        input_box(sx, sy, "Start URL", settings_w-24)
        input_box(sx, sy+52, "Test mode (E2E / Load / Stress / Endurance)", col_w)

from pathlib import Path

def rect(x,y,w,h,rx=6,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#C8C8C8",sw=1,opacity=1.0):
    return f'<rect x="{x}" y="{y}" width="{w}" height="{h}" rx="{rx}" fill="{fill}" stroke="{stroke}" stroke-width="{sw}" opacity="{opacity}"/>'

def text(x,y,s,size=14,weight=400,fill="#111111",anchor="start"):
    s = (s.replace("&","&amp;").replace("<","&lt;").replace(">","&gt;"))
    return (f'<text x="{x}" y="{y}" fill="{fill}" font-family="Inter, Segoe UI, Arial" '
            f'font-size="{size}" font-weight="{weight}" text-anchor="{anchor}">{s}</text>')

def make_main_ru(path: Path, tab: str, telegram_open: bool, include_steps: bool):
    W,H=1440,900
    pad=16
    gap=12
    top_h=64
    tabs_h=44
    log_h=220
    
    left_w=260
    selectors_w = 360 if tab=="UI" else 0
    telegram_w = 340 if telegram_open else 0
    
    x0=pad; y0=pad
    content_y=y0+top_h+gap
    content_h=H-content_y-pad
    center_h=content_h-log_h-gap
    
    total_w=W-2*pad
    right_stack_w = selectors_w + (gap if (selectors_w and telegram_w) else 0) + telegram_w
    main_w = max(total_w-right_stack_w, 640)
    
    tabs_y=content_y
    upper_y=tabs_y+tabs_h+gap
    upper_h=center_h-tabs_h-gap
    log_y=upper_y+upper_h+gap
    
    settings_x=x0+left_w+gap
    settings_w=main_w-left_w-gap
    
    el=[]
    el.append(f'<rect x="0" y="0" width="{W}" height="{H}" fill="#F7F7F7"/>')

    # Top bar
    el.append(rect(x0,y0,total_w,top_h,rx=10,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    el.append(text(x0+12,y0+24,"WebLoadTester",size=16,weight=800))
    
    by=y0+16
    btn_w, btn_h = 92, 32
    def btn(x,label,kind="primary"):
        if kind=="primary":
            fill="#2563EB"; stroke="#2563EB"; tcol="#FFFFFF"
        elif kind=="danger":
            fill="#DC2626"; stroke="#DC2626"; tcol="#FFFFFF"
        else:
            fill="#FFFFFF"; stroke="#C8C8C8"; tcol="#111111"
        return rect(x,by,btn_w,btn_h,rx=8,fill=fill,stroke=stroke)+text(x+btn_w/2,by+21,label,size=13,weight=800,fill=tcol,anchor="middle")
    bx=x0+180
    el.append(btn(bx,"–°—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç","primary"))
    el.append(btn(bx+btn_w+10,"–°—Ç–æ–ø","danger"))
    el.append(btn(bx+2*(btn_w+10),"–°–±—Ä–æ—Å","secondary"))
    
    # Telegram toggle
    tgl_w=120
    tgl_x=x0+total_w-tgl_w-12
    tgl_fill="#E5E7EB" if telegram_open else "#FFFFFF"

    # Tabs

    tabs=[("UI","UI —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ"),("HTTP","HTTP —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ"),("NET","–°–µ—Ç—å –∏ –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å"),("REP","–û—Ç—á—ë—Ç—ã")]

        code_selected="HttpFunctional"
    elif tab=="NET":

        input_box(sx+col_w+col_gap,sy+104,"–®–∞–≥ / –ø–∞—É–∑–∞ / —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–∏",col_w,32)
        checkbox(sx,sy+160,"Headless (–±–µ–∑ UI)")
        checkbox(sx+220,sy+160,"–°–∫—Ä–∏–Ω—à–æ—Ç—ã")
        input_box(sx,sy+198,"–ü–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫ —à–∞–≥–∞ (–ü—Ä–æ–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å / –û—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω / –û—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å –≤—Å—ë)",settings_w-24,34)

            box_y=sy+264
            box_h=upper_h-(box_y-upper_y)-16
            el.append(rect(sx,box_y,settings_w-24,box_h,rx=10,fill="#FAFAFA",stroke="#E0E0E0"))
            ry=box_y+14

            for i,lab in enumerate(steps):

            el.append(text(sx+12,box_y+box_h-14,"–†–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥–∞—Ü–∏—è: ScrollViewer –¥–ª—è —É–∑–∫–∏—Ö/–Ω–∏–∑–∫–∏—Ö –æ–∫–æ–Ω.",size=11,weight=500,fill="#666666"))
        else:

            el.append(text(sx,sy+274,"–ï—Å–ª–∏ –Ω—É–∂–Ω—ã —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–µ —Ç–∏–ø—ã —à–∞–≥–æ–≤ (–æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è/–ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∏) ‚Äî –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∏ ¬´–®–∞–≥–∏ —Å—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏—è¬ª.",size=12,weight=600,fill="#666666"))
    elif tab=="HTTP":
        input_box(sx,sy,"–ë–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–π URL (–æ–ø—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ)",settings_w-24)
        input_box(sx,sy+52,"–¢–∞–π–º–∞—É—Ç (–º—Å)",col_w)

        el.append(text(sx,sy+104,"–≠–Ω–¥–ø–æ–∏–Ω—Ç—ã",size=12,weight=900,fill="#444444"))
        table_y=sy+118

from pathlib import Path

def rect(x,y,w,h,rx=6,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#C8C8C8",sw=1,opacity=1.0):
    return f'<rect x="{x}" y="{y}" width="{w}" height="{h}" rx="{rx}" fill="{fill}" stroke="{stroke}" stroke-width="{sw}" opacity="{opacity}"/>'

def text(x,y,s,size=14,weight=400,fill="#111111",anchor="start"):
    s = (s.replace("&","&amp;").replace("<","&lt;").replace(">","&gt;"))
    return (f'<text x="{x}" y="{y}" fill="{fill}" font-family="Inter, Segoe UI, Arial" '
            f'font-size="{size}" font-weight="{weight}" text-anchor="{anchor}">{s}</text>')

def button(x,y,w,h,label,kind="secondary"):
    if kind=="primary":
        fill="#2563EB"; stroke="#2563EB"; tcol="#FFFFFF"
    elif kind=="danger":
        fill="#DC2626"; stroke="#DC2626"; tcol="#FFFFFF"
    elif kind=="ghost":
        fill="#F3F4F6"; stroke="#E5E7EB"; tcol="#111111"
    else:
        fill="#FFFFFF"; stroke="#C8C8C8"; tcol="#111111"
    return rect(x,y,w,h,rx=8,fill=fill,stroke=stroke)+text(x+w/2,y+h*0.68,label,size=13,weight=900,fill=tcol,anchor="middle")

def input_box(el,x,y,w,label,value="",h=32):
    el.append(text(x,y-6,label,size=12,weight=800,fill="#444444"))
    el.append(rect(x,y,w,h,rx=8,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#C8C8C8"))
    if value:
        el.append(text(x+12,y+22,value,size=13,weight=600,fill="#111111"))

def checkbox(el,x,y,label,checked=False):
    el.append(rect(x,y,16,16,rx=4,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#C8C8C8"))
    if checked:
        el.append(text(x+8,y+13,"‚úì",size=12,weight=900,anchor="middle"))
    el.append(text(x+24,y+13,label,size=13,weight=600))

def pill(el,x,y,w,label,fill="#EEF2FF",stroke="#C7D2FE",tcol="#1D4ED8"):
    el.append(rect(x,y,w,28,rx=14,fill=fill,stroke=stroke))
    el.append(text(x+w/2,y+19,label,size=12,weight=900,fill=tcol,anchor="middle"))

def make_ui_scenario_v4(path: Path, telegram_open: bool):
    # Screen constants
    W,H=1440,900
    pad=16
    gap=12
    top_h=64
    tabs_h=44
    log_h=220
    
    # widths
    left_w=260
    selectors_w=360
    telegram_w=340 if telegram_open else 0
    
    total_w=W-2*pad
    right_stack_w = selectors_w + (gap if (selectors_w and telegram_w) else 0) + telegram_w
    main_w = max(total_w-right_stack_w, 700)
    
    x0=pad; y0=pad
    content_y=y0+top_h+gap
    content_h=H-content_y-pad
    center_h=content_h-log_h-gap
    tabs_y=content_y
    upper_y=tabs_y+tabs_h+gap
    upper_h=center_h-tabs_h-gap
    log_y=upper_y+upper_h+gap
    
    # Columns for main area
    settings_x=x0+left_w+gap
    settings_w=main_w-left_w-gap
    
    el=[]
    el.append(f'<rect x="0" y="0" width="{W}" height="{H}" fill="#F7F7F7"/>')
    el.append(rect(8,8,W-16,H-16,rx=14,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    
    # Top bar
    el.append(rect(x0,y0,total_w,top_h,rx=10,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    el.append(text(x0+12,y0+24,"WebLoadTester",size=16,weight=900))
    
    # action buttons
    by=y0+16
    bx=x0+180
    el.append(button(bx,by,92,32,"–°—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç","primary"))
    el.append(button(bx+102,by,92,32,"–°—Ç–æ–ø","danger"))
    el.append(button(bx+204,by,92,32,"–°–±—Ä–æ—Å","secondary"))
    
    # telegram toggle button on top-right
    tgl_w=120
    tgl_x=x0+total_w-tgl_w-12
    el.append(button(tgl_x,by,tgl_w,32,"Telegram","ghost" if telegram_open else "secondary"))
    
    # status pill
    st_x=tgl_x-320
    el.append(text(st_x,y0+24,"–°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å:",size=12,weight=800,fill="#444444"))
    pill(el,st_x+62,y0+10,118,"–û–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ")
    el.append(text(st_x+196,y0+24,"–ü—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–µ—Å—Å: 0/0",size=12,weight=800,fill="#444444"))
    
    # Tabs row (only main width)
    el.append(rect(x0,tabs_y,main_w,tabs_h,rx=10,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    tabs=[("UI —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ",True,170),("HTTP —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ",False,190),("–°–µ—Ç—å –∏ –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å",False,230),("–û—Ç—á—ë—Ç—ã",False,120)]
    tx=x0+12
    for label,active,tw in tabs:
        el.append(rect(tx,tabs_y+8,tw,28,rx=8,fill="#E5E7EB" if active else "#FFFFFF",stroke="#C8C8C8" if active else "#E0E0E0"))
        el.append(text(tx+tw/2,tabs_y+28,label,size=13,weight=900 if active else 600,anchor="middle"))
        tx += tw+10
    
    # Modules list
    el.append(rect(x0,upper_y,left_w,upper_h,rx=10,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    el.append(text(x0+12,upper_y+24,"–ú–æ–¥—É–ª–∏",size=14,weight=900))
    modules=[("–°—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏–π UI",True),("–°–Ω–∏–º–æ–∫ UI",False),("–¢–∞–π–º–∏–Ω–≥–∏ UI",False)]
    iy=upper_y+40
    for m,sel in modules:
        el.append(rect(x0+12,iy,left_w-24,32,rx=8,fill="#E5E7EB" if sel else "#FFFFFF",stroke="#C8C8C8"))
        el.append(text(x0+24,iy+22,m,size=13,weight=900 if sel else 600))
        iy += 40
    
    # Settings card
    el.append(rect(settings_x,upper_y,settings_w,upper_h,rx=10,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#E0E0E0"))
    el.append(text(settings_x+12,upper_y+24,"UiScenario ‚Äî –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ã –∏ —à–∞–≥–∏",size=14,weight=900))
    
    sx=settings_x+12
    sy=upper_y+44
    col_gap=12
    col_w=(settings_w-24-col_gap)/2
    
    # Run parameters (compact labels)
    input_box(el,sx,sy,settings_w-24,"–°—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–æ–≤—ã–π URL","https://example.com")
    input_box(el,sx,sy+52,col_w,"–†–µ–∂–∏–º","E2E")
    input_box(el,sx+col_w+col_gap,sy+52,col_w,"–ü–∞—Ä–∞–ª–ª–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å","10")
    input_box(el,sx,sy+104,col_w,"–ü—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω—ã / –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç—ã","50")
    input_box(el,sx+col_w+col_gap,sy+104,col_w,"–ü–æ—Ä–æ–≥/–ø–∞—É–∑–∞/—É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–∏ (—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—Å—Å)","‚Äî")
    checkbox(el,sx,sy+160,"Headless (–±–µ–∑ UI)",checked=True)
    checkbox(el,sx+220,sy+160,"–°–∫—Ä–∏–Ω—à–æ—Ç –ø—Ä–∏ –æ—à–∏–±–∫–µ",checked=True)
    input_box(el,sx,sy+198,settings_w-24,"–ü–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫ —à–∞–≥–∞","–ü—Ä–æ–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å / –û—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–≥–æ–Ω / –û—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å –≤—Å—ë",h=34)
    
    # Divider title for steps designer
    steps_y = sy+250
    el.append(text(sx,steps_y,"–®–∞–≥–∏ —Å—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏—è",size=12,weight=900,fill="#444444"))
    
    # Steps toolbar
    tb_y = steps_y+10
    # "–î–æ–±–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å —à–∞–≥" with dropdown hint
    el.append(button(sx, tb_y, 140, 32, "–î–æ–±–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å —à–∞–≥", "primary"))
    el.append(text(sx+124, tb_y+22, "‚ñæ", size=14, weight=900, fill="#FFFFFF", anchor="middle"))
    el.append(button(sx+152, tb_y, 92, 32, "–£–¥–∞–ª–∏—Ç—å", "secondary"))
    el.append(button(sx+256, tb_y, 48, 32, "‚Üë", "secondary"))
    el.append(button(sx+316, tb_y, 48, 32, "‚Üì", "secondary"))
    
    # Steps list + editor split inside settings to keep adaptive
    list_y = tb_y+44
    list_w = int((settings_w-24-col_gap)*0.48)
    editor_w = (settings_w-24-col_gap) - list_w
    el.append(rect(sx, list_y, list_w, upper_h - (list_y-upper_y) - 16, rx=10, fill="#FAFAFA", stroke="#E0E0E0"))

from pathlib import Path

def rect(x,y,w,h,rx=6,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#C8C8C8",sw=1,opacity=1.0):
    return f'<rect x="{x}" y="{y}" width="{w}" height="{h}" rx="{rx}" fill="{fill}" stroke="{stroke}" stroke-width="{sw}" opacity="{opacity}"/>'

def text(x,y,s,size=14,weight=400,fill="#111111",anchor="start"):
    s = (s.replace("&","&amp;").replace("<","&lt;").replace(">","&gt;"))
    return (f'<text x="{x}" y="{y}" fill="{fill}" font-family="Inter, Segoe UI, Arial" '
            f'font-size="{size}" font-weight="{weight}" text-anchor="{anchor}">{s}</text>')

def button(x,y,w,h,label,kind="secondary"):
    if kind=="primary":
        fill="#2563EB"; stroke="#2563EB"; tcol="#FFFFFF"
    elif kind=="danger":
        fill="#DC2626"; stroke="#DC2626"; tcol="#FFFFFF"
    elif kind=="ghost":
        fill="#F3F4F6"; stroke="#E5E7EB"; tcol="#111111"
    else:
        fill="#FFFFFF"; stroke="#C8C8C8"; tcol="#111111"
    return rect(x,y,w,h,rx=8,fill=fill,stroke=stroke)+text(x+w/2,y+h*0.68,label,size=13,weight=900,fill=tcol,anchor="middle")

def input_box(el,x,y,w,label,value="",h=32):
    el.append(text(x,y-6,label,size=12,weight=800,fill="#444444"))
    el.append(rect(x,y,w,h,rx=8,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#C8C8C8"))
    if value:
        el.append(text(x+12,y+22,value,size=13,weight=600,fill="#111111"))

def checkbox(el,x,y,label,checked=False):
    el.append(rect(x,y,16,16,rx=4,fill="#FFFFFF",stroke="#C8C8C8"))
    if checked:
        el.append(text(x+8,y+13,"‚úì",size=12,weight=900,anchor="middle"))
    el.append(text(x+24,y+13,label,size=13,weight=600))

def pill(el,x,y,w,label,fill="#EEF2FF",stroke="#C7D2FE",tcol="#1D4ED8"):
    el.append(rect(x,y,w,28,rx=14,fill=fill,stroke=stroke))
    el.append(text(x+w/2,y+19,label,size=12,weight=900,fill=tcol,anchor="middle"))
